meaningMnemonic: On the <radical>roof</radical> there's some type of <radical>turkey</radical> <radical>bird</radical>, but thinner and longer. You look closer and realize it's a <kanji>crane</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>crane</kanji> leans down toward you from its roof perch and squawks, "<reading>Too ru</reading>de (つる)!" You're shocked! You didn't know the crane could speak English, but even worse, it knew you called it a turkey bird.
